name: The Exterminator (MintyFoxGames)
description:
Hello everyone! ^-^

Thank you for showing interest in my game.!

The Exterminator follows the protagonist as he wakes up in a strange dungeon far from his hometown. As soon as the protagonist realises he wakes up in a dungeon well-known for the possibly hidden treasures there, he learns how to face his fears and slowly acquires an insatiable greed for wealth. Having (probably) relieved himself of all potential threats.. he makes his escape..

Please note: This is my very first game. Expect some errors or visual imperfections.

And most important of all: Enjoy!
